question: Comet Hyakutake orbits the sun every 55 years. Ethan's uncle saw the Comet when he was 46 years old. Ethan saw the comet a second time when he was two times the age his uncle was when he saw the Comet. How old was Ethan when he saw the Comet for the first time?
answer:
Ethan saw the Comet for the second time when he was 46 years * 2= <<46*2=92>>92 years old.
Comet Hyakutake can be seen every 55 years, so Ethan saw the comet for the first time when he was 92 years - 55 years = <<92-55=37>>37 years old.
#### 37
